item.description: Hey everyone! Patriots play yet another MNF!! YAY!! Let's all gather at the newly established "District 7" in Malden, MA for this game. Located conveniently near the Malden Center Orange Line, www.district7pub.com for directions/address. They have 1/2 price appetizers during the game and I HIGHLY recommend the buffalo chicken dip. YUUUUM! PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU. Game starts @ 8:30 but come down early to get a seat. For new folks, I'll be wearing a Welker Jersey. Come on down!
item.how_to_find_us: Will be wearing a Welker jersey.
item.name: MNF with the PATRIOTS!
